dict.string: Allow AIMT Student to connect to Bluetooth devices? This enables AIMT Student to connect to nearby Bluetooth devices for [specific purpose, e.g., pairing, sharing data, etc.]

Allow AIMT Student to use biometric authentication? This enables the use of your fingerprint or facial recognition for secure and convenient access to [specific app features, e.g., login, verification, etc.]
Grant AIMT Student access to your calendar? This allows AIMT Student to manage events, schedules, and reminders seamlessly within your calendar app for better organization and timely notifications.

Grant AIMT Student access to the camera? This allows AIMT Student to take photos, record videos, and use augmented reality features for [specific purpose, e.g., capturing moments, scanning documents, etc.]

Allow AIMT Student to access your contacts? This enables AIMT Student to easily share information and connect with your contacts for [specific purpose, e.g., inviting friends, syncing contacts, etc.], ensuring a smoother user experience.
Enable location access for [App Name]? This enables [App Name] to provide location-based services such as [specific service, e.g., finding nearby places, improving accuracy, etc.]
Enable notifications for AIMT Student? You'll receive important updates and alerts regarding [specific app-related notifications, e.g., new messages, reminders, etc.].
Allow AIMT Student to access photos, media, and files on your device? This allows AIMT Student to save and retrieve necessary data for a seamless experience.
